subject_labels: Must use CDK v2 constructs only - no v1 compatibility imports
NAT Gateways must be deployed one per AZ for redundancy
All subnets must be /24 CIDR blocks as specified
VPC Flow Logs must capture ALL traffic (accepted and rejected)
Security group rules must use CDK Peer objects, not raw CIDR strings
Parameter Store paths must follow /vpc/production/{resource-type}/{az} naming convention
Stack must be deployable in any AWS region without hardcoded values
Use L2 constructs where available, avoid CfnResource unless necessary
All resources must have removal policies set to DESTROY for easy cleanup
